item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and  bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Luxe Burger Bar 5 Memorial Blvd., near Union Station and across from Ardeo and the Capital Grille. We haven't been back here in awhile and this was a request, so here we go! Luxe Burger Bar is pretty self-explanatory, except that the decor is a step above a typical burger place and I have it on good authority that the burger variety and "build-your-own" are quite delicious! Apparently, they also have new outside seating too! So let's check it out!

PLEASE RSVP!!!!

Hope to see you there! Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be there by 6:30 at the latest , otherwise look for a group by the bar.
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Luxe Burger Bar!
